mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Correspondence from C. W. Wickham
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Personal correspondence, starts with a P.S. so there may have been more that is missing, from C. W. Wickham, 1 original piece faded to the point of almost illegible.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
